scripts.title: Marketing Scripts
scripts.description: Manage your marketing scripts with priority ordering for optimal performance

script1.label: Marketing Script 1 (Highest Priority)
script1.description: Your most important marketing script (e.g., Google Tag Manager)

script2.label: Marketing Script 2 (High Priority)
script2.description: Your second priority marketing script (e.g., Facebook Pixel)

script3.label: Marketing Script 3 (Medium Priority)
script3.description: Your third priority marketing script (e.g., Analytics tracking)

script4.label: Marketing Script 4 (Low Priority)
script4.description: Your fourth priority marketing script (e.g., Additional tracking)
